verbose_text: We found that treatment with alphaTNFR2 or a NIK inhibitor prevented the induction of p52 observed in response to TNF-alpha with similar efficacy, suggesting that the NIK inhibitor is a potent tool to block TNF-alpha-induced TNFR2 signaling in ILC2s (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG).
evidence: NIK inhibitor prevented the induction of p52
